report.title: An Effective Dose Level
report.author: Duggin
report.bodytext: Mindset & Setting: I was tired going into this. I'd been up for a day and a half, but got sleep the night before this trip. I didn't feel particularly tired, but I knew my body was. /n /n Experience: This was my first time trying this substance. /n /n Preparation: The 4-AcO-MiPT I had was very sticky, and in the time it took to weigh my dose out (just a few minutes), it had gotten twice as dark as its original tan color. It was now brown. It dissolved over a matter of minutes into my cup of water (without stirring), and was in 2 stuck-together chunks when I dropped it in. It's so sticky and clumpy that it would be nearly impossible to chop it up into powder. /n /n ------------------------------------------------------ /n /n 9:48 start drinking my water with 8 mg 4-aco-mipt HCl in it. This stuff tastes horrible. I can taste it with every drink. It's pretty bitter. /n /n 9:56 start smoking a joint with my water. /n /n 10:05 done drinking the water. I only smoked a quarter of that joint. I'm high for sure. /n /n 10:13 I'm seeing trails from my arms moving, etc. and I'm VERY FUCKING HIGH. I am very cold as well. /n /n 10:15 I'm seeing awsome patterns in the floor. and on the walls. /n /n 10:17 A bit of tremoring, it's like parts of my body have shivers, and others don't. /n /n 10:20 I got under my covers on my bed and the shivering stopped. I was pretty cold. I just turned the fan off. Not so cold anymore. /n /n Visuals are pretty strong now. Great patterning everywhere now, and I'm getting aural hallucinations of the computer fan wahing. /n /n 10:31 patterning when I close my eyes. heavy visuals from this stuff. strangely enough, visuals are heavy with the lights out as well. /n /n 10:38 I smoke more of the joint. /n /n 10:45 tripping pretty hard. not so hard I can't type though. /n /n 10:48 it looks like the wall is the floor and I'm penned up agains a wall when I lean back in my chair. /n /n 10:49 my perceptions are changing a lot, but I think I could still hold a conversation with someone. I'll see when my brother come in in a minute. /n /n ...can't really understand some of the stuff on TV. Communicating with my brother is relatively easy. /n /n 11:35 I'm stoned. colors are changing every now and then. I'm really tired from having stayed up the last few days... I don't think the joint helped my tired state. I just want to go to bed again. /n /n 11:41 bed. /n /n 12:24 so tired but I can't sleep. I lay on my bed, not wanting to get up, but I can't fall asleep. The weed is wearing off now. The visuals are still pretty much here. As well the aural hallucinations /n /n 12:39 I'm definitely coming down, and not tripping as hard as I was. I just smoked that J down to the paper and I still feel this way about the 4-aco-mipt. Visuals are still here, but it's just less intense now. the visuals just don't move as fast now. /n /n ...Going back to bed. I'm tired, but I just can't fall asleep so far. It's very strange. /n /n 1:45 hallucinations are still there, but they're not as intense or plentiful as they were. Not overtaking like they were. I can't sleep. /n /n 2:53 things are chilling out. I'm returning to 'baseline' but things are still giving minor trails/other patterning like visuals. /n /n 3:40 things aren't moving around that much. Patterns on the ceiling are there, but not moving fast at all and tracers are minor. /n /n 4:20 visuals almost all gone. slight patterning on the ceiling. slight tracers. /n /n 4:52 almost baseline. I'm hungry and tired. going to go to bed. /n /n Sleep was good, had interesting dreams. I am amazed that this dose level was so effective. I'd like to take this substance again sometime when I'm not so tired.
